original_title: Former aide set to testify in GOP probe about Biden’s mental fitness for office | CNN Politics
article_summary: Former Biden aide Ian Sams testifies before the House Oversight Committee on March 12, 2024, as part of a GOP-led investigation into allegations of a cover-up of Biden's mental decline and potential unauthorized executive actions. Other aides, including Anita Dunn and Steve Ricchetti, have defended Biden, stating he remained fully engaged and clear during their interactions, and there was no nefarious conspiracy to hide his mental condition.</s>
